## IconMaterial class

2D material for icons, similar to \[\[TextMaterial\]\]. Uses component in texture coordinates to apply opacity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class IconMaterial extends THREE.RawShaderMaterial 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [map](./harp-materials.iconmaterial.map.md) |  | THREE.Texture | Icon texture map/atlas. |
